elements.text: Yes Michalis-Menton enzyme kinetics is a classic 3 system

text: I see, so you model the enzyme as binding together with one of the molecules and then the combination interacting. Ok, I can see how that would work. And can these methods simulate a discrete number of all three molecules or do you need a continuum approximation for one or all of them?
